last_episode_to_air.name: Deadly Dynamics
last_episode_to_air.overview: A brutal murder is committed in front of the Hattenbrun home, and police must focus on several family members to catch the sadistic killer; before long, they discover a shocking truth that no one thought possible.

name: Relatively Evil
overview: Inspired by the box office smash, GET OUT each episode of this intimate psychological thriller will explore the terrifying, real-life events of an outsider who falls for someone in a seemingly normal family only to find themselves entangled in an evil clan capable of abuse, kidnapping, or something even more sinister.As each story unfolds, this fatal fish-out-of-water series is a reflection of life's own unpredictable path of twists and turns, in a journey that exposes the shady underbelly of the family tree. All the while the newcomer is questioning their own sense of reality and in some cases, morality as small signs of trouble become dark and deadly. Once you join the family, can you ever get out?
